sourcesContent:
import imageProj1 from './images/projects/proj-1.jpeg' import imageProj3 from './images/projects/proj-3.jpg' import imageProj4 from './images/projects/proj-4.jpg' import imageProj5 from './images/projects/image1.jpg' import imageProj6 from './images/projects/image2.jpg' import imageResturant from './images/projects/restaurant.jpg' const projects = [ { "id": 1, "title": " Movies WebSite with real Api ", "category": " React Js", "description": "used framework :React.js with Real Api ", "image": imageProj1, "Link_Url": "https://movies-app-with-mahmoudbogdady.surge.sh/", "Used_Tools ": '1- Axios to fetch data from the API
' + '2- bootstrap. React-bootstrap
' + '3- Routing using react-router-dom
.'+ '4- @fortawesome for icons.
', "features_in_website": " 1- responsive website.
" + " 2- show movies and watch
"+ " 3- search about any film with english language or arabic
" + " 4- arabic language
" }, { "id": 2, "title": " Restaurant-Menu ", "category": " React Js", "description": "used framework :React.js ", "image": imageResturant, "Link_Url": "https://menu-new-resturantmahmoud.surge.sh/", "Used_Tools ": '1 - react Bootstrap
' + '2 - filter
' + '3 - react-reveal
', "features_in_website": " 1- responsive website
." + " 2- show all items
"+ " 3- Offer meals by meal type.
" + " 4- search about meal
." }, { "id": 3, "title": " E-Commerce App ", "category": " React Js", "description": "used framework :React.js with Real Api ", "image": imageProj3, "Link_Url": "https://ecommerce-baghdad-shop-pro.surge.sh/", "Used_Tools": "1- Redux-Toolkit for state management
" + "2- react icons
" + "3- Routing using react-router-dom
" + "4- Pagination
" + "5- pure css
" + "6- json-server
", "features_in_website": " 1- responsive website.
" + " 2- show items.
"+ " 3- add items to cart.
" + " 4- remove items from cart
. " + " 5- update items.
" + " 6- sort items by category.
" + " 7- sort items by price
" + " 8- save in localStorage
" }, { "id": 4, "title": " website company ", "category": " Html and css", "description": "For a project consisting of a simple and attractive web page to view information. The project is designed without using any fram work to show my design skills and control elements ", "image": imageProj4, "Link_Url": "https://mahmoudboghdady99.github.io/template-1/", "Used_Tools ": "html css", "features_in_website": " not responsive ." }, { "id": 5, "title": " website company ", "category": " Html and css", "description": "For a project consisting of a simple and attractive web page to view information. The project is designed without using any fram work to show my design skills and control elements ", "image": imageProj5, "Link_Url": "https://mahmoudboghdady99.github.io/project-templete-2/", "Used_Tools ": "html css", "features_in_website": " not responsive ." }, { "id": 6, "title": " website person ", "category": " Html and css", "description": "For a project consisting of a simple and attractive web page to view information. The project is designed without using any fram work to show my design skills and control elements ", "image": imageProj6, "Link_Url": "https://mahmoudboghdady99.github.io/template-3-responsive-Design/", "Used_Tools ": "html css", "features_in_website": " responsive ." }, ] export default projects;
